data.title: Washington Adventist University
data.meta_description: WAU is a private university offering programs in Arts & Social Sciences, Graduate and Professional Studies, and Health Professions, Science & Wellness.
data.text:
Need Financial Aid? We Got You Covered!

We understand that the cost of education may be hindering efforts to attain the future you deserve. Complete your 2024-2025 FAFSA today and use WAU’s school code #002067 and let us help you achieve your goals.

Benefit from WAU scholarships available for Adventist Graduate Hispanic Students.

Diversity and inclusion are cornerstones of our faith, therefore we have developed a financial aid program to help our underserved Hispanic community have full access to a WAU education.

Take the WAU Virtual Tour

Become a Student at WAU

Three schools, one mission: Student Success. Delve into the world of WAU with our schools of Arts & Social Sciences, Graduate and Professional Studies, and Health Professions, Science & Wellness.

School of Arts & Social Sciences

DISCOVER YOUR FUTURE TODAY through undergraduate degrees which will equip you with credentials for your career in business, computer science, english, education, history, information technology, music, political science, psychology, counseling, religion/theology or general studies. Discover advanced ways to apply these skills in our Honors College where – through expanded nation’s capital learning and accelerated pre-law pathways from any discipline – you will be uniquely prepared to enrich our world.

School of Graduate & Professional Studies

DISCOVER YOUR FUTURE TODAY through graduate degrees in administration/management, psychology and counseling which prepare you to advance your career or begin a new career. Expand your DISCOVERY through undergraduate degrees which prepare for careers in administration/management, nursing, counseling psychology, early childhood care, general studies, and the music therapy equivalency program. Finally, DISCOVER that All of our degrees and programs are accelerated, accredited, affordable, flexible and especially designed for you as an adult learner.

School of Health Professions, Science & Wellness

DISCOVER YOUR FUTURE TODAY as you prepare for demand careers in fields such as biology, biochemistry, health science, fitness & sport science, nursing, medical imaging. Experience distinctive clinical learning at Adventist Health Care, – after which, you emerge equipped to fulfill your niche as a practitioner of healing & healthy living.

How We Have Experienced WAU!

Students share their thoughts about WAU as they prepare to graduate.

We Are Invested In the Success of Our Students

Read what WAU students have to say about their education and how it has paved the path for their success.

“Washington Adventist University’s support during Ukraine’s trials taught me that true education transcends the classroom, embodying empathy and community spirit, lessons that will stay with me long after graduation.”

Sofiia Yatsyshyna / WAU Music Performance Student

Fill out this quick form and let one of our knowledgeable advisors help you apply to one of our rewarding programs. Your bright future awaits and WAU is poised to help you get there faster.

WAU By The Numbers

WAU is proud of our unique and extraordinary programs, people and accomplishments! We are constantly raising the bar for higher education, making sure everyone has a chance to learn and experience excellence.

1st

WAU has the one and only Honors College in the Adventist Higher Education System.

1st

Our religion department is the only urban evangelism-focused program in the Adventist Higher Education System.

1st

WAU boasts the ONLY Music Therapy Program in Maryland & the entire Adventist Tertiary System in North America!

7th

Counseling Degree ranking based on price, accreditation, reputation, and salary potential.

96%

Of undergraduate freshmen received grant financial aid

2%

Top 2% in addressing the graduation rate gap between wealthy students and those in poverty.

51

Countries are represented in our diverse student body

Latest News

All the latest news brought right to your screen. Find out what’s new with Washington Adventist University and stay on top of our latest announcements here.

WAU Earns NAIA Champions of Character Five-Star...

TAKOMA PARK, MD – Washington Adventist University (WAU) has been honored with the prestigious NAIA Champions of Character Five-Star Institution Award for the 2023-2024 academic year. This accolade recognizes WAU's unwavering commitment to fostering a culture…

Washington Adventist University Secures Maryland’s CCCPDF Grant...

Takoma Park, MD – Washington Adventist University (WAU) has been approved for Maryland’s Child Care Career and Professional Development Fund (CCCPDF) grant for the 2024-2025 school year. This grant will cover 100% of tuition and…

VP Dirk Whatley Elected President-Elect of Urban...

TAKOMA PARK, Md. — Dirk Whatley, the accomplished enrollment leader at Washington Adventist University (WAU), has been elected as the President-Elect of the Urban Enrollment Association, part of the Adventist Association of Colleges and Universities…
